thread.section_title: Verizonfiosbundles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verizonfiosbundles | verizonfiosbundles.com
thread.title: Manuel Jacome

author: Manuel Jacome
title: Manuel Jacome
text: Recently had a great experience calling Verizon and getting FIOS installed. Process was quick and smooth. Representative was friendly, patient and eager to help me switch from my current provider. It was also great to speak to someone in the US and not a satellite office in another country..these calls can be frustrating at times. Looking forward to great service and experience with Verizon FIOS!!
